Patients stratify accord institution , initial histology ( grade II v grade III ) , WHO performance status ( 0-1 v 2 ) , prior treatment ( radiotherapy [ RT ] alone , temozolomide [ TMZ ] procarbazine , lomustine vincristine [ PCV ] alone vs TMZ/RT ) .
